titleStmt.title: May it please your Lordship, having formerly discourst amongst the crowd of arguments which have been vented since the knowledg of the peace; ...
titleStmt.author: Orme, Thomas, d. 1716.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
Item at 724:23 incorrectly labelled O436 in reel guide and on film.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Bodleian Library.
